request.description:
Generate an access token and refresh token that you can use to call our resource APIs.

Validates correct status code and sets up {{access_token} for future API calls.

**Request Environment variables setup by the user:**

*   {{subdomain}} - User tenant.
*   {{host}} - User domain.
*   {{clientId}} & {{clientSecret}} - Both values can be retrieved from OL Administration page : Developers > Access Credentials > New Credentials
    

**Response Environment variables setup after execution:**

*   {{access_token}} - Use this token to call OL resource APIs.

Use this API to generate a session login token in scenarios in which MFA may or may not be required. Both scenarios are supported. A session login token expires two minutes after creation.

Validates correct status code and sets up {{auth_session_token}} for future API calls.

**Request Environment variables setup by the user:**

*   {{oapiUrl}} - OL oAPI domain.
*   {{subdomain}} - User tenant.
*   {{host}} - User domain.
*   {{portal_test_user_email}} & {{portal_test_user_password}} - *Request body variables.* User credentials for portal app authentication.
    

**Request Environment variables setup in previous calls:**

*   {{access_token}} - Authentication header from */api/v3/custom_brand?session_token={{portal_old_session_token}}*.
    

**Response Environment variables setup after execution:**

*   {{auth_session_token}} - Session token with an expiry date. Use this token to call OL resource APIs.

For authorization use Authorization bearer token. "access_token" is used from the previous call.

Validates correct status code. **The endpoint sends a cookie which sets a session on Postman cookies.**

More Info: [https://developers.onelogin.com/api-docs/1/login-page/create-session-via-token](https://developers.onelogin.com/api-docs/1/login-page/create-session-via-token)

**Request Environment variables setup by the user:**

*   {subdomain}} - User tenant.
*   {{host}} - User domain.
    

**Request Environment variables setup in previous calls:**

*   {{access_token}} - Authentication header from */api/v3/custom_brand?session_token={{portal_old_session_token}}*.
*   {{auth_session_token}} - *Body Request variable.* Env variable is set up from */api/1/login/auth*
